faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about When22Meet
faq.tryService: Try the service yourself to learn more.

q1.question: What is When22Meet?
q1.answer: When22Meet is a free scheduling service that makes it easy to coordinate group schedules. It can be used without login, allowing participants to mark their available dates to find the best meeting time.

q2.question: Do I need to sign up?
q2.answer: No, you can use it immediately without sign-up or login. When you create a schedule, a link is generated that you can share to invite participants.

q3.question: How long is data stored?
q3.answer: Schedule data is stored for 18 months before being automatically deleted. For long-term storage, we recommend taking screenshots or captures.

q4.question: How can I select multiple dates at once?
q4.answer: You can drag your mouse on the calendar to select multiple dates at once. You can also use the "Quick Selection" buttons (Weekend, Weekday, Fri-Sat-Sun) to automatically select the corresponding dates.

q5.question: Can I add participants later?
q5.answer: Yes, you can specify participants when creating the schedule, or add them anytime using the "Add Participant" button on the schedule screen.

q6.question: How do I indicate my availability?
q6.answer: Click on each date to cycle through: Available (yellow) → Unavailable (gray) → Undecided (white). Select the state that represents your availability.

q7.question: Can I easily see which dates work best for everyone?
q7.answer: Yes, the "dates with the most available participants" are automatically displayed at the top of the screen. It updates in real-time to help you easily identify the optimal meeting dates.

q8.question: Can I use this on mobile?
q8.answer: Yes, it's optimized for mobile browsers. You can use it directly in your web browser without installing any app.

q9.question: What happens when I lock the schedule?
q9.answer: Clicking the "Finalize Schedule" button locks everyone's availability so it can no longer be modified. This prevents accidental changes after the final decision is made.

q10.question: What if I lose the link?
q10.answer: Unfortunately, if you lose the link, you cannot recover that schedule. Since there's no login system, we recommend saving the link in KakaoTalk, notes, or somewhere safe.
